subject: Steroids
Football
lead_paragraph: In the N.F.L., there are extroverted outlaws and dopers who, when hidden beneath a helmet, blend in as league members performing incognito without the repercussion of scrutiny.
snippet: In the N.F.L., there are extroverted outlaws and dopers who, when hidden beneath a helmet, blend in as league members performing incognito without the repercussion of scrutiny.
